channel.title: Kant on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Kant on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: Consistency is the Enemy
item.description: This is my fourth daily writing exercise and I’m getting nervous. Here’s why: I didn’t wake up with an idea of what to write here. I’m doing this on borrowed time whilst my daughter watches Disney cartoons with headphones two metres away from me. I am uncertain how many hugs and snacks will be required before this is over, and whether I will get better or worse at this juggling act.
